name: Moon Dozer
description:
Have you ever wondered how it feels to play golf, billard or pinball with the Moon as a ball and the entire Earth as playground? Discover it with Moon Dozer!

Controls:
WASD and arrows: move camera
Q/E: Rotate camera left/right
Z/X: camera zoom in/out

Fire Ball:
Press left mouse button at the desired direction. Release it when the power bar is at the desired point.

H: show/hide Help

Game made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 38.
